list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The road goes downhill from here onwards.

list_definition.definition: towards a worse and worse state

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We expected him to die, I suppose, because he’s been going steadily downhill for months.

list_ex_of_english: As a result, there will be a national downhill race in respect of this regulation.
